revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ruckus Wireless |model=MediaFlex 7211 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/09/2010 |manuf_country=Malaysia |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=S9GMF7211 |ic_id=5912A-MF7211 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC8M16A2 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=V54-HOME001,V54-HOME002 |default_ssid_regex=^V54-HOME00[1-2]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.30.1 |default_user=super |default_pass=sp-admin |oui=74:91:1A |oui_eth=74:91:1A }} [https://support.ruckuswireless.com/products/23-mediaflex-7211/documents Support documents]
There are multiple sub-models of this device. *MediaFlex 7211 802.11n Outdoor Smart Wi-Fi Gateway (integral antenna) *MediaFlex 7211 802.11n Indoor/EXT Smart Wi-Fi Gateway (U.FL->RP-SMA connector on EXT models only)
The '''Ruckus Wireless''' logo, "GD 16", "Asm 120-11139["<written 002>"]Rev[ ]", and "Ser. No. ["<written 415>"]" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"100-11138-001 REV 4" (or something) is on the component side of the board.
Per the manual, the default SSIDs for this device are '''V54-HOME001''' (WIreless 1) and '''V54-HOME002''' (Wireless 2).
